attributes.additional_details: Any political party is held accountable to there manifesto. It to be a legal binding contract with the people and should it be broken the term is up and legal action if required to be taken to the full power of the law as would be for anyone breaking a contract .

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Manifesto's have to be implemented by law within 2 years of taking office

Created by: Nigel Snowden

Closing: 30/03/2015
